dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5084 IH: HUBZone Equity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cárdenas (for himself, Ms. Meng, Ms. Hahn, Mr. Carson of Indiana, Mr. Vargas, Mrs. Negrete McLeod, Ms. Clarke of New York, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Ruiz, and Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To ensure equal access for HUBZone designations to all tax-paying small business owners.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the HUBZone Equity Act.

section.header: Amendment to definition of HUBZone small business concern
section.text: Subparagraph (A) of section 3(p)(3) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632 (p)(3)) is amended by inserting or lawful permanent residents of the United States after United States citizens.
